settingsimportpageDescription: Import data from plain activity files or a Strava bulk export.  See documentation for details and limitations.
bulkImportIntegrationBody: Bulk import activities from files (in the data/activity_files/bulk_import folder)
errorMessageUnableToImportActivities: An error occurred while importing activities
stravaGearImportBody: Import bikes or shoes from a Strava bulk export (in data/strava_import).
errorMessageUnableToImportBikes: An error occurred while importing Strava bikes
errorMessageUnableToImportShoes: An error occurred while importing Strava shoes
stravaBulkImportBody: Import activities and their media from a Strava bulk export (in data/strava_import)
successMessageStravaBulkImport: Strava activities successfully queued for import; see logs for further status updates
errorMessageUnableToBulkImport: An error occurred while importing Strava activities from a bulk export
